email_chain.subject: Freight Offer: Iron Ore Shipment from Tubarão to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Dear Laura,

I hope this email finds you well. We have the vessel OCEAN HARMONY available for your iron ore shipment from Tubarão to Qingdao. Vessel details: DWT 180,000, LOA 300m. Freight rate is $25/MT CFR. Laycan is 20-25 October. Please let me know if this works for you.

Best regards,
Alex

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer: Iron Ore Shipment from Tubarão to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Hi Alex,

Thank you for the offer. The rate seems a bit high. Can you do $22/MT? Also, could you confirm the demurrage rate and provide the vessel's certificates?

Best,
Laura

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer: Iron Ore Shipment from Tubarão to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Dear Laura,

Thank you for your response. The best I can do is $23/MT. Demurrage rate is $10,000/day. I will send over the vessel's certificates shortly.

Best regards,
Alex

email_chain.subject: Fwd: Vessel Certificates - OCEAN HARMONY
email_chain.body:
Laura,

Please find attached the vessel's certificates for your review.

Best regards,
Alex

[ATTACHMENTS: vessel_certs.pdf]

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer: Iron Ore Shipment from Tubarão to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Hi Alex,

Thank you for the certificates. We agree to the rate of $23/MT. Please proceed with the booking.

Best,
Laura

email_chain.subject: Booking Confirmation: Iron Ore Shipment from Tubarão to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Dear Laura,

Booking confirmed for the OCEAN HARMONY. Laycan remains 20-25 October. Please find the recap below:
- Commodity: Iron Ore
- Cargo Size: 150,000MT
- Load Port: Tubarão
- Discharge Port: Qingdao
- Freight Rate: $23/MT CFR
- Laycan: 20-25 October
- Demurrage: $10,000/day

Let me know if any corrections are needed.

Best regards,
Alex
